plugin.Name: PeopleSoft
plugin.Description:
Supports Functional testing using Selenium 3.141.59
-.-.-.-.-.--.--.-.-.-.-.--.-TESTED-.-.-.-.-.--.--.-.-.-.-.--.- FireFox : version 16 to 61 Chrome : version 16 to 70 InternetExplorer : version 8 to 11
|_ IE DriverServer Executable : http://selenium-release.storage.googleapis.com/index.html |_ ChromeDriver Executable : http://chromedriver.storage.googleapis.com/index.html |_ GeckoDriver Executable : https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/tag/v0.16.1

Setting.Name: XMLHttpRequestTimeOut
Setting.Description: Provide Wait(in seconds) for XMLHttpRequest to complete. Default WaitTime is 30 seconds

Setting.Name: UseWaitForPageLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for page load.

Setting.Name: UseWaitForAngularLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for Angular to load

Setting.Name: UseWaitForJQueryLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for JQuery to load

Setting.Name: UseWaitForXMLHttpRequestLoad
Setting.Description: Check this to wait for XMLHttpRequest to load

Setting.Name: ChromeDriverPath
Setting.Description: Give the ChromeDriver.exe path according to the version of Google Chrome used. Provide if you are using Google Chrome.

Setting.Name: IEDriverPath
Setting.Description: Give the IEDriver.exe path according to the version of Internet Explorer used. Provide if you are using Internet Explorer.

Setting.Name: FirefoxDriverPath
Setting.Description: Give the GeckoDriver.exe path according to the version of Firefox used. Provide if you are using Firefox.

Setting.Name: EdgeDriverPath
Setting.Description: Give the MicrosoftWebDriver.exe path according to the version of MicrosoftEdge Browser used. Provide if you are using Microsoft Edge .

Setting.Name: OperaDriverPath
Setting.Description: Give the OperaDriver.exe path according to the version of Opera used. Provide if you are using Opera.

Setting.Name: Host
Setting.Description: Give the Host Address of the Remote Selenium Hub.

Setting.Name: Port
Setting.Description: Give the Port Number of the Remote Selenium Hub.

Setting.Name: ProxyHost
Setting.Description: Give the Host Address of the Proxy Server, if needed.

Setting.Name: ProxyPort
Setting.Description: Give the Port Number of the Proxy Server, if needed.
